abilitynet_advice: [CY] AbilityNet has advice on making your device easier to use if you have a disability.
about_this_service_description: [CY] This accessibility statement applies to Authorised agent accounts.
accessibility_features: [CY] change colours, contrast levels and fonts using browser or device settings
[CY] zoom in up to 400% without the text spilling off the screen
[CY] navigate most of the website using a keyboard or speech recognition software
[CY] listen to most of the website using a screen reader (including the most recent versions of JAWS, NVDA and VoiceOver)
accessibility_support_link_text: [CY] Find out more about accessibility support for Companies House users
compliance_description: [CY] This website is fully compliant with the
eass_details_second_part: [CY] contact the Equality Advisory and Support Service (EASS).
enforcement_details: [CY] The Equality and Human Rights Commission (EHRC) is responsible for enforcing the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018 (the ‘accessibility regulations’). If you're not happy with how we respond to your complaint,
feedback_description: [CY] We're always looking to improve the accessibility of this service.
feedback_problem_instruction: [CY] If you find any problems that are not listed on this page, contact us using the details on our
improvement_measures: [CY] work with real users who have accessibility issues to make sure that our services meet their needs
[CY] carry out internal tests for compliance with Web Content Accessibility Guidelines V2.2 level A and level AA
[CY] recruit users through {USER_PANEL_LINK} and agencies to take part in usability sessions
[CY] build and test our services to meet {GOV_ACCESSIBILITY_LINK}
last_tested: [CY] This service was last tested on 5 February 2025. The test was carried out by the {DIGITAL_ACCESSIBILITY_CENTRE_LINK}. They tested the main journey.
page_header: [CY] Accessibility statement for Authorised agent accounts
preparation_date: [CY] This statement was prepared on 12 March 2025. It was last reviewed on 05/02/2025.
service_details_second_part: [CY] We want as many people as possible to be able to use this service. For example, that means you should be able to:
simplified_text: [CY] We've also made the service text as simple as possible to understand.
technical_details: [CY] Companies House is committed to making its website accessible in accordance with the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018.
technical_information: [CY] Technical information about this service's accessibility
to_improve_service_accessibility: [CY] To improve this service's accessibility, we:
usability_blog_text_second_part: [CY] to find out more about our user research work.
what_were_doing_to_improve: [CY] What we're doing to improve accessibility
